name: Spacebar Battle
description:
This a two player game where the aim is to push your opponent out of the arena. However both players share the firing button! The game isn't completely finished so any comments about design or bugs would be great.  Thanks and I hope you enjoy!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bearlydesi...

Development Log: https://medium.com/@bearlydesi...

Controls

Player 1 movement - WASD

Player 2 movement  - IJKL

shoot - Spacebar
